text: "The Meitheis" is an encyclopedic book written by "Thomas Callan Hodson". It is about the traditions, folklore and folktales of the Meitei ethnicity. It is a monograph, originally published under the orders of the Government of Eastern Bengal and Assam in 1908. ==Related pages== * The Pleasing of the Gods: Meitei Lai Haraoba ==References== Category:1908 books Category:Encyclopedias
title: The Meitheis
